product_overview: CryptoTracker is a responsive web app for tracking live cryptocurrency data such as price, volume, and price changes. It fetches real-time APIs to update data every 30 seconds without page refresh, and provides portfolio management, interactive charts, and alert notifications.
core_goals: Provide users with live cryptocurrency market data updated every 30 seconds.
Enable users to manage their crypto holdings portfolio with live price tracking and alerts.
Visualize cryptocurrency price trends over selectable timeframes with interactive charts.
Ensure the application is responsive and accessible on both desktop and mobile devices.
Integrate third-party live chat and analytics to enhance user engagement and monitor traffic.
key_features: Real-time price, volume, and change data fetched via CoinGecko API using Axios with automatic refresh every 30 seconds.
Responsive UI built with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 4, and custom styling including gradients and animations.
Portfolio manager implemented in React that persists user holdings and alerts to localStorage, fetches live prices, and allows alert configuration per coin.
Line charts using react-chartjs-2 and Chart.js displaying price trends with timeframe selection and coin filtering.
Notification-based alerts for prices with drop-down enhancements for better user experience.
Third-party live chat integration for user support.
Google Analytics integration for live traffic monitoring.
Custom utilities such as UNIX time conversion for improved data presentation.
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage featuring hero section, about, observation, portfolio segments, and footer with consistent styling.
User views live-updated cryptocurrency price tables that refresh automatically every 30 seconds.
User navigates to portfolio section to add, update, or remove coin holdings and sets price alerts.
User interacts with coin line charts by selecting different coins and timeframes to analyze trends.
User receives real-time notifications when configured price alerts are triggered.
User can interact with a live chat widget for support and feedback.
Google Analytics tracks user behavior and site traffic for continual improvement.
validation_criteria: Live cryptocurrency data updates correctly every 30 seconds without requiring page refresh.
Portfolio changes persist across sessions using localStorage with accurate live price updates.
Price alerts trigger timely notifications based on user-defined parameters.
Chart displays update correctly on timeframe and coin selection changes.
The siteâ€™s responsive design works seamlessly across desktop and mobile devices.
Third-party live chat and Google Analytics integrations function correctly.
All features perform without critical errors and with acceptable performance on supported browsers.
